text: Santamaria was a company in North-West Italy producing motor bikes with 49cc, 69cc, 98cc, 123cc and 147cc engines produced by Franco Morini, JLO, Minarelli, Sachs, Zundapp.Erwin Tragatsch, The Illustrated Encyclopedia of Motorcycles, Hamlyn, 1980 == Models produced (incomplete) == *Tigrotto *Tigrotto Sport ==References== Category:Defunct motorcycle manufacturers of Italy
title: Santamaria (motorcycles)
